entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
